title: Instructional Design Workshop Utilizing Intended Learning Outcomes (ILOs)

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic curriculum design concepts
context.additional_context: Emphasis on practical learning experiences through participant observation and semi-structured interviews

learning_goals: Learners can understand the definition of Intended Learning Outcomes (ILOs) and explain how to apply them in instructional design.
Learners can systematically conduct needs analysis using participatory observation techniques.
Learners can evaluate the interconnectedness of Intended Learning Outcomes (ILOs) by analyzing semi-structured interview data.
Learners can draft instructional designs by integrating ILOs into real-world educational cases.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
